title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: In quoting these ancient authorities, I mu^t notforget the more modern sketch of a Scottish soldierof the old fashion, by a master-hand, in the character of Lesmahagow, since the existence of thatdoughty Captain alone must deprive the presentauthor of all claim to absolute originality.
